official_title: Designating the Mozart Bicentennial at the Lincoln Center in New York City, New York, as the National Observance of the 200th anniversary of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's death.

summary.text: Designates the Mozart Bicentennial at Lincoln Center in New York City from January 1991 through August 1992 as the National Observance of the 200th anniversary of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's death.

titles.title: Designating the Mozart Bicentennial at the Lincoln Center in New York City, New York, as the National Observance of the 200th anniversary of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's death.
